Datapoint receiver

POST https://aide.syncleus.com/robotek/customers/receiver
Request parameters
{{datapoint.key}} {{datapoint.type}} {{datapoint.description}}
{{datapoint.rangeMin}}-∞ to {{datapoint.rangeMax}}∞ {{datapoint.states}}
Request example
Content-Type: application/json
Response example
201 Datapoint successfully recorded.
Content-Type: application/json

Insight analysis

GET https://aide.syncleus.com/robotek/customers/insight
Request parameters
given Map A map describing the known properties of the datapoint
{{datapoint.key}} {{datapoint.type}} {{datapoint.description}}
{{datapoint.rangeMin}}-∞ to {{datapoint.rangeMax}}∞ {{datapoint.states}}
target string A string specifying the boolean logic for the desired fields.
Request example
Content-Type: application/json
Response example
201 Insight successfully analyzed.
Content-Type: application/json

Discovery creation

POST https://aide.syncleus.com/robotek/customers/discovery
Request parameters
name string Name for the discovery being created
description string Description for the discovery being created
filter string A string specifying the boolean logic for filtering datapoints being analyzed.
target string A string specifying the boolean logic for the desired fields.
capacity number The number of top matching datapoints to retain.
1 to ∞
historyDepth number The maximum number of datapoints to learn from already stored in the datastore.
0 to ∞
Request example
Content-Type: application/json
Response example
201 Dsicovery successfully created, training begining..
Content-Type: application/json

{{datapoint.rangeMin}}-∞ to {{datapoint.rangeMax}}∞ {{datapoint.states}}
Request example

Response example

Content-Type: application/json
